Text.val: 28.12.2013 GB SCR18609 Extended condition where V.DIFFERENCE is used
05.05.2011 JH SCR16393 Replaced GNRL_CURRENCY by ADMN_CURRENCY and GB002 by GB902
-- only if at least one differenece exists perfrom the following updates

SQL_STMT_U.val: Select cast (sum(inva_actafactoring) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actaretention) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actadisputes) as decimal(13,2)), cast (sum(inva_actaspecial) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/inva inner join :1/invo on invo_no = inva_no and invo_admno = :2 and invo_clntno = :3 and invo_aactuali<>0 where inva_currency= ':4' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
